title: Abd Allah ibn al-Zubayr
summary: Abd Allah ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam (Arabic: عبد الله ابن الزبير ابن العوام‎, romanized: ʿAbd Allāh ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām; May 622–624 CE – October/November 692), was the leader of a caliphate based in Mecca that rivaled the Umayyads from 683 until his death.
